title: What is the meaning of resident doctors?

og.title: What is the meaning of resident doctors?
og.description:
Answer (1 of 19): Resident doctors are the backbone of Indian medical system.

1.PG Resident doctors are the doctors practising at hospitals as part of their post-graduation studies.

After three years of their services, they have to give exams after passing which they get their medical certifica...
